_id.description: Unique identifier automatically generated by MongoDB for each course document.

courseId.description: Custom course ID used to identify the course within the platform.

title.description: The official title or name of the course.

description.description: Detailed information about what the course covers, objectives, and outcomes.

instructorId.description: The unique ID of the instructor responsible for the course.

category.description: The category or subject area to which the course belongs (e.g., Data Science, Web Development).

difficultyLevel.description: Indicates the difficulty level of the course (beginner, intermediate, or advanced).

duration.description: The total duration of the course in hours.

price.description: The price of the course in the selected currency.

tags.description: List of tags or keywords associated with the course to improve searchability.

isPublished.description: Indicates whether the course is published and visible to students.

isActive.description: Indicates whether the course is currently active or inactive.

reviewRate.description: Average rating of the course based on student reviews (typically between 0.0 and 5.0).

createdAt.description: The date and time when the course record was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the course record was last updated.

description: Schema definition for the Courses collection, which stores information about all available courses.
